hero.title: AGNIESZKA WAWRO
hero.subtitle: Architect Engineer
hero.description1: Ambitious 2nd semester student of Master's Degree in Architecture at Gdańsk University of Technology.
hero.description2: In June 2025, I received the title of
hero.description3: I am committed to developing my professional skills. I am an open person, focused on acquiring knowledge and achieving goals.

midi.description: Student internship involving architectural and construction design, site development projects, and development of AutoCAD and SketchUp skills.

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.description: What I love most about architecture is interior design. I don't have much experience yet, but I would really like to develop in this direction.

urban.title: Urban Design
urban.description: On a larger scale, urban design is close to my heart. I enjoy analyzing broader aspects that influence a project and solving related problems by creating a larger design concept, not just the building itself.

sport.title: Sports and Activity
sport.description: Besides architecture, sports are close to my heart, and they have been with me since childhood. Active leisure time clears my mind, and training since school years taught me to manage time very well and efficiently.

collages.title: Drawing Collages
collages.description: Presentation of my artistic works featuring drawing collages - a combination of different techniques and perspectives in harmonious compositions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.inviteMessage: Feel free to contact me regarding collaboration or architectural projects
